Lotto Powerball jackpot: Tickets sales close for monster draw, fourth-largest prize in NZ history https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/lotto-powerball-jackpot-43-million-marks-fourth-largest-prize-in-nz-history/YTJ4KHTWYZGMRBLKXHHTIHEWJQ/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/lotto-powerball-jackpot-43-million-marks-fourth-largest-prize-in-nz-history/YTJ4KHTWYZGMRBLKXHHTIHEWJQ/ Raphael FranksSales close at 7.30pm and the winning numbers will be drawn about 8.30pm. Wed, 05 Jun 2024 07:48:24 +0000 There are only a couple of hours to go until New Zealanders find out whether tonight’s bounteous $43 million Lotto Powerball jackpot belongs to them.
Taranaki mattress murder trial: Leigh Beer recalls efforts to rescue Emma Field from fatal fire https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/taranaki-mattress-murder-trial-leigh-beer-recalls-efforts-to-rescue-emma-field-from-fatal-fire/DYZ6GCOUDZBGJG4HVREXXO6J3Q/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/taranaki-mattress-murder-trial-leigh-beer-recalls-efforts-to-rescue-emma-field-from-fatal-fire/DYZ6GCOUDZBGJG4HVREXXO6J3Q/ Tara ShaskeyBut he claims he can't remember much else, including how the blaze broke out. Wed, 05 Jun 2024 07:19:11 +0000 Emma Field's body was found after a fire ripped through her New Plymouth flat in 2022. Her partner Leigh Matthew Frederick Beer is on trial for her alleged murder and arson.

Waitaanga homicide investigation: Police find van as they probe fatal shooting of father of four https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/waitaanga-homicide-investigation-police-find-van-as-they-probe-fatal-shooting-of-father-of-four/PWM753UL4RD4HCURWLXXPIMFQI/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/waitaanga-homicide-investigation-police-find-van-as-they-probe-fatal-shooting-of-father-of-four/PWM753UL4RD4HCURWLXXPIMFQI/ A Waitaanga home was extensively damaged, with a body later found at the scene. More jail ordered for teen rapist Peter Kosetatino, who victimised stranger at Auckland park https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/crime/more-jail-ordered-for-teen-rapist-peter-kosetatino-who-victimized-stranger-at-auckland-park/UBTZTF6RSFF65NTYNKMUWTWEEU/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/crime/more-jail-ordered-for-teen-rapist-peter-kosetatino-who-victimized-stranger-at-auckland-park/UBTZTF6RSFF65NTYNKMUWTWEEU/ Craig KapitanPeter Kosetatino initially sought home detention and permanent name suppression. Photo / Michael Craig
